video_title: How to get 145k followers on LinkedIn in 1 year (it takes less than 1h/week)

key_takeaways: Solution: Post content first, wait 4 hours, then edit to add external links (Difficulty: beginner)

Growth Tactic: LinkedIn storytelling with photos (Channel: content)

trend_opportunities.title: LinkedIn becoming the new Twitter for viral content
